text: Tyaneca akasatuna parjan'ya vrsti keli, maga apapalya samarthyanusara nale vahu lagale, maga panyacya pravahane vara cadhuna phesa ucalala ani tya vastutahi jila agita takuna tapavitata dagine kinva samanakarita, tyaca prakaraca phesa ahe. Asa prakare sarvasrestha allaha satya ani asatyala spasta karanyasathi udaharana deto. Ata to phesa nikami ho'una nighuna jato, parantu jya gosti lokanna labha pohacavinarya aheta, tya dharatita tikuna rahatata. Sarvasrestha allaha asa prakare udaharana deta asato
